descriptionHtml:
***Message to the users of this mod***
Please report me, if this mod work in combination with the dawnguard dlc, because I haven\'t it yet.

This mod will make your Vampires pale as snow. The following races are changed: breton, imperial, nord, redguard, high-,dark-,woodelf and orc. Both genders are changed. I have changed the female hazelbrown eyes to vampire eyes. My motivation was, to make vampires look like in reallife lore. When you have ideas or wishes of cosmetic typ, leave a comment. Hope you like it :)

Added now a new option with less sunken cheeks.

PS: Sorry for my bad English
PPS: I have mods like coverwomen activated so maybe your charakter looks a little bit different.
PPPS: Thank you for over 30000 views^^

****************Compatibiliytable*****************************************
---[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9717]Better Vampires by Brehanin[/URL]---
---Other sorts of Vampireoverhauls---
---WIP---

****************Recommanded mods*****************************
---[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Covereyes[/URL]---
---[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8832]Realistic Eye Lighting[/URL]---
author: Xerrogg
